original_text: Therefore the wild beasts of the desert with the wild beasts of the islands shall dwell there, and the owls shall dwell therein: and it shall be no more inhabited for ever; neither shall it be dwelt in from generation to generation.
korean_text: 그러므로 사막의 들짐승이 승냥이와 함께 거기에 살겠고 타조도 그 가운데에 살 것이요 영원히 주민이 없으며 대대에 살 자가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the wild beasts of the desert
with the wild beasts of the islands
and the owls shall dwell therein:
and it shall be no more inhabited for ever;
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 영원히 다시는 사람이 살지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: neither shall it be dwelt in from generation to generation.
